Package index

dbSpatial Package

Functions for constructing dbSpatial objects

dbSpatial()
Create a dbSpatial object with geometry

Spatial Relationships

Functions that calculate spatial relationships between two dbSpatial objects.

st_contains()
Determine if geometries in two dbSpatial objects contain each other
st_coveredby()
Determine if geometries in two dbSpatial objects are covered by each other
st_covers()
Determine if geometries in two dbSpatial objects are covering each other
st_crosses()
Determine if geometries in two dbSpatial objects are crossing
st_difference()
Find difference in geometries between two dbSpatial objects
st_disjoint()
Determine if geometries between two dbSpatial objects are disjoint
st_distance()
Find distance between geometries in two dbSpatial objects
st_equals()
Determine if geometries between two dbSpatial objects are equal
st_intersects()
Determine if geometries between two dbSpatial objects are intersecting
st_touches()
Determine if geometries between two dbSpatial objects are touching

Spatial Summary

Functions that summarize geometry data in a dbSpatial object.

st_extent()
Get extent of a geometry

Spatial Properties

Functions that return a single vector about a geometry in a dbSpatial object.

st_geometrytype()
Return geometry type
st_isvalid()
Determine if geometry is valid
st_xmax()
Get maximum x coordinate
st_ymax()
Get maximum y coordinate

Geometry construction

Functions for constructing or modifying geometry in a dbSpatial object.

st_read()
Read spatial data from a file and create a table in a duckdb database
st_translate()
Translate x, y coordinates by delta x, delta y for point geometries
tessellate()
Tessellate a dbSpatial object

DuckDB Spatial Extension

Functions specific for DuckDB spatial extension.

loadSpatial()
Install and/or load DuckDB spatial extension

On this page
